en-US.name: Craft Count
en-US.summary: A hands-free row counter with project management and smart reminders for knitting and crochet.
en-US.description: Craft Count helps you track your rows without putting down your needles. Say 'next row' to increment your counter, manage multiple projects by name, and set reminders for specific rows like decreases or color changes. Craft Count gives you a heads-up the row before so you're always prepared.
examplePhrases: Alexa, tell craft count next row
Alexa, ask craft count what row am I on

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Create a project, increment rows, set reminders, and switch between projects.
